Name: Bouldin Island Alfalfa
Vegetation Description (IGBP): Croplands: Lands covered with temporary crops followed by harvest and a bare soil period (e.g., single and multiple cropping systems). Note that perennial woody crops will be classified as the appropriate forest or shrub land cover type.
Climate Class Description (Koeppen): Mediterranean: mild with dry, hot summer

Name: Bouldin Island corn
Vegetation Description (IGBP): Croplands: Lands covered with temporary crops followed by harvest and a bare soil period (e.g., single and multiple cropping systems). Note that perennial woody crops will be classified as the appropriate forest or shrub land cover type.
Climate Class Description (Koeppen): Mediterranean: mild with dry, hot summer

Name: Blodgett Forest
Vegetation Description (IGBP): Evergreen Needleleaf Forests: Lands dominated by woody vegetation with a percent cover >60% and height exceeding 2 meters. Almost all trees remain green all year. Canopy is never without green foliage.
Climate Class Description (Koeppen): Mediterranean: mild with dry, hot summer

Name: Sierra Critical Zone, Sierra Transect, Ponderosa Pine Forest, Soaproot Saddle
Vegetation Description (IGBP): Evergreen Needleleaf Forests: Lands dominated by woody vegetation with a percent cover >60% and height exceeding 2 meters. Almost all trees remain green all year. Canopy is never without green foliage.

Name: Sierra Critical Zone, Sierra Transect, Sierran Mixed Conifer, P301
Vegetation Description (IGBP): Evergreen Needleleaf Forests: Lands dominated by woody vegetation with a percent cover >60% and height exceeding 2 meters. Almost all trees remain green all year. Canopy is never without green foliage.

Name: Sierra Critical Zone, Sierra Transect, Subalpine Forest, Shorthair
Vegetation Description (IGBP): Evergreen Needleleaf Forests: Lands dominated by woody vegetation with a percent cover >60% and height exceeding 2 meters. Almost all trees remain green all year. Canopy is never without green foliage.

Name: Diablo
Vegetation Description (IGBP): Grasslands: Lands with herbaceous types of cover. Tree and shrub cover is less than 10%. Permanent wetlands lands with a permanent mixture of water and herbaceous or woody vegetation. The vegetation can be present in either salt, brackish, or fresh water.
Climate Class Description (Koeppen): Mediterranean: mild with dry, hot summer

Name: Eden Landing Ecological Reserve
Vegetation Description (IGBP): Permanent Wetlands: Lands with a permanent mixture of water and herbaceous or woody vegetation that cover extensive areas. The vegetation can be present in either salt, brackish, or fresh water
Climate Class Description (Koeppen): Mediterranean: mild with dry, hot summer

Name: Lindcove Orange Orchard
Vegetation Description (IGBP): Croplands: Lands covered with temporary crops followed by harvest and a bare soil period (e.g., single and multiple cropping systems). Note that perennial woody crops will be classified as the appropriate forest or shrub land cover type.

Name: Mayberry Wetland
Vegetation Description (IGBP): Permanent Wetlands: Lands with a permanent mixture of water and herbaceous or woody vegetation that cover extensive areas. The vegetation can be present in either salt, brackish, or fresh water
Climate Class Description (Koeppen): Mediterranean: mild with dry, hot summer

Name: Southern California Climate Gradient - Sonoran Desert
Vegetation Description (IGBP): Barren Sparse Vegetation: Lands exposed soil, sand, or rocks and has less than 10% vegetative cover during any time of the year.

Name: Southern California Climate Gradient - Oak/Pine Forest
Vegetation Description (IGBP): Mixed Forests: Lands dominated by trees with a percent cover >60% and height exceeding 2 meters.  Consists of tree communities with interspersed mixtures or mosaics of the other four forest types.  None of the forest types exceeds 60% of landscape.

Name: Southern California Climate Gradient - Grassland
Vegetation Description (IGBP): Grasslands: Lands with herbaceous types of cover. Tree and shrub cover is less than 10%. Permanent wetlands lands with a permanent mixture of water and herbaceous or woody vegetation. The vegetation can be present in either salt, brackish, or fresh water.

Name: Southern California Climate Gradient - Coastal Sage
Vegetation Description (IGBP): Open Shrublands: Lands with woody vegetation less than 2 meters tall and with shrub canopy cover between 10-60%. The shrub foliage can be either evergreen or deciduous.

Name: Southern California Climate Gradient - Pinyon/Juniper Woodland
Vegetation Description (IGBP): Open Shrublands: Lands with woody vegetation less than 2 meters tall and with shrub canopy cover between 10-60%. The shrub foliage can be either evergreen or deciduous.
